title: Grammar Checker
quote: est your knowledge of grammar and sentence correctness!

questions.question: Identify the error in the sentence: "He don’t know the answer."
Choose the correct sentence.
questions.answer: There are many books on the table.
options: There is many books on the table.
There are many books on the table.
There was many books on the table.
There will be many books on the table.

questions.question: What is the error in the sentence: "She go to school daily"?
